fullText: Despite the star power of Raul Esparza and a slick production, this musical about a con-man evangelist never finds its spiritual center or comic groove.
dtliExcerpt: Despite the star power of Raul Esparza and a slick production, this musical about a con-man evangelist never finds its spiritual center or comic groove.
